description: Retrieve a calculated attribute for a customer profile.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

parameters.name: ProfileId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of a customer profile.

parameters.name: CalculatedAttributeName
parameters.description: The unique name of the calculated attribute.

nested_items.name: CalculatedAttributeName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the calculated attribute.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the calculated attribute.

nested_items.name: IsDataPartial
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the calculated attribute's value is based on partial data. If data is partial, it is set to true.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the calculated attribute.
